description: This is a React component defining the main application interface for a personal journal manager, handling user authentication, journal entry creation, editing, deletion, and display.

methods.name: fmt
methods.description: Utility function to format a timestamp into a human-readable local string.

methods.name: loadMe
methods.description: Fetches current user info from API and updates state.

methods.name: loadEntries
methods.description: Fetches journal entries from API and updates state.

methods.name: onLogout
methods.description: Logs out the user and clears user and entries state.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Creates a new journal entry via API and adds it to the state.

methods.name: onSelectEdit
methods.description: Prepares an entry for editing by setting draft state.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Saves edits to an existing journal entry.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a journal entry via API.
